segments.text: Good morning ! My name is John White , import manager of the Garden Trading Company of New York .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , how do you to Mr . White ? My name is Li Ming , here is my card .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Nice to meet you Mr.Li . We have learned about that you specialize in the export business of electronic products . As you enjoy the highest reputation in the commercial circle , we'd be please to enter into business relations with your firm .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We share the same desire . Have you seen the display of our products in the exhibition hall downstairs ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I had a look just now , I feel we can do a lot of business in this line .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , we can . You know , we are been in the line for more than twenty years , and I think our price are competitive comparing with those in the world market .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Our company enjoys a history of more than twenty years , we have wide connection with wholesalers and retailers all over the America , and we have good reputation in the commercial circle .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you for your information , we can hold more talks later on business details .
segments.speaker: S2
